website_summaries.verdict: A little pricey, but completely worth the extra bucks for the high quality.
pros: Flawless faucet for your home kegerator
The stainless steel design provides durability for constant usage
The forward pull provides zero leaks and a non-sticking lever
cons: The price point isn't overly friendly

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell you what you'll get...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these. The first shipment only contained one, so I logged a complaint and the missing 2nd one was sent, but it was missing the tail piece for connecting to the tubing. So, I logged another complaint and had to ship back that one and finally got another replacement today which is different than the first and second ones - no detachable tailpiece and it appears to be stainless while the others were chromed brass. I like this last one best - stainless and fewer pieces to clean. But, seems a roll of the dice what YOU will get. I eventually need 2 more, but not sure I want to take a chance on this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Heitkamp

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucets
customer_reviews.text: These things are fantastic. I used two in a kegerator build and have not looked back. One thing to note is that the handles angle backwards, in my case that made larger tap handles hit the fridge door. This can be fixed with an adapter, but I have not found a good one yet. The taps themselves are amazing though.
customer_reviews.author: Morkeleb

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: I have not as yet installed them, but they are beautiful and entirely stainless (despite the description). The part number referenced in the description comes back to a 100% stainless product on the vendor's website (check for yourself before buying). This is a great price for this product (~$60/assembly) and I am going to order another one. Now if only I had not given up beer for Lent...
customer_reviews.author: Robbie F.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this
customer_reviews.text: Best faucet I've ever had, now I just need more. Front seal makes so much sense after using one, no sticky action.
customer_reviews.author: John T. Gray

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye sticky faucets.
customer_reviews.text: Giving a 3 star because one of the 2 I purchased has a machining defect in the ball keep on top of the tap that makes it pull hard and requires extra effort to close. The other one is flawless though and functions great.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Gerding

customer_reviews.title: Beware of the shanks
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased 3 of these units from this seller. I am very satisfied with the Perlick faucet. They are as advertised but I am dissatisfied with the shanks that came with these units. They all look slightly different and one came with the wrong sized nipple. I had to spend more money to purchasing the correct nipple and my shanks still do not match...
customer_reviews.author: Beer4me

customer_reviews.title: Different types of shanks.
customer_reviews.text: I placed 2 orders about a week apart. I recieved 2 different types of shanks in the orders. The first was in kegco boxing and the second was not. The shanks were noticeably different. One perlick faucet is not sealing correctly and may need to be returned. First order was a 5 second was a 2.
customer_reviews.author: bryan snyder

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing faucet! Never gets stuck or clogged like others. I can keep the keg pressure significantly higher than my old faucet and still get a smooth pour. Highly recommended

customer_reviews.title: Great taps, and a good price
customer_reviews.text: Great taps, and a good price. They seal quite well, and don't leak at all - a real worry for those who don't use/check their taps every day.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, functional, highly recommend this faucet.

customer_reviews.title: Real SS Perlick
customer_reviews.text: It's a real Perlick stainless steel tap. Not to much more to say about it. The Perlicks are far superior to cheaper backward sealing alternatives. They don't need nearly as much cleaning, and are easier to clean when they do. They also drip less and don't get sticky.

customer_reviews.title: You won't regret this purchase
customer_reviews.text: You will never have any regrets buying this Perlick. I spent the extra bucks, and it's SO worth it. Works perfectly, and being stainless, I never have to worry about chrome peeling off.

customer_reviews.title: Look no further Perlick is one of the best names in the game

customer_reviews.title: Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey, but definitely worth it. Looks beautiful on my kegerator, and the lack of moving parts means maintenance and sanitation between batches will be much less of a headache. Buy this model, you won't regret it.

customer_reviews.title: Great Faucet for a Great Price
